Dialogue.text: Oh hi!! I knew I would find you in this big turtle looking house. hehehe..
Dialogue.Speaker: Miss Puffin

Dialogue.text: Anyway. I had found this weird - I mean, INTERESTING pearl…
Dialogue.Speaker: Miss Puffin

Dialogue.text: and I thought it might be a wonderful gift for you for helping me gather my pearls
Dialogue.Speaker: Miss Puffin

Dialogue.text: It is not a pearl! It is one of THE EGGS!
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: Oh! No wonder it looks so um...  different!
Dialogue.Speaker: Miss Puffin

Dialogue.text: I was shopping at the market place....
Dialogue.Speaker: Miss Puffin

Dialogue.text: and Manta, from the Junkshop, gave the egg to me. Oh! Isn't he such a darling!
Dialogue.Speaker: Miss Puffin

Dialogue.text: Junk shop? We can most probably get a new propellor for my ship too!
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: Anyways, you have it now, glad you like it, I have got to craft my necklace! Toodaloo~
Dialogue.Speaker: Miss Puffin

Dialogue.text: Well... Miss Puffin sure is quite the character.
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: I guess we know where to go next, Let's go!
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally
